text: Mark Craib (born 8 February 1970) is a Scottish footballer, who played in the Scottish Football League for Dundee and Montrose. ==External links== * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Association football central defenders Category:Scottish footballers Category:Dundee F.C. players Category:Montrose F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:Sportspeople from St Andrews
title: Mark Craib
